hero.title: OUTDOOR TRAININGS
hero.subtitle: DESI4FIT
hero.description: Ready for a fresh start? Join our small group training and experience the perfect blend of strength training and cardio! We adapt to everyone's level and injuries, so you can train safely and effectively. Accessible, fun, and results-driven! Rain or shine - thanks to the station's covered area, we train in all weather! ☀️🌧️

level1.title: Personal Training
level1.desc: Your goals, your pace, your success! Enjoy exclusive one-on-one training sessions completely tailored to your wishes and fitness level. With maximum personal attention and customized workouts, you'll reach your goals faster than ever. Duration: 60 minutes of pure focus on you! 💪

level2.title: Duo Training
level2.desc: Stronger together! Train with your friend, partner, or family member and make fitness a shared experience. Share the motivation, celebrate victories together, while still receiving personal attention from your trainer. Perfect for couples, friends, or workout buddies who love to push each other! Duration: 60 minutes getting fit together! 🤜🤛
level2.imageAlt: Duo training session with two people

level3.title: Small Group Training
level3.desc: Feel the energy! Join a close-knit group of 3-10 enthusiastic athletes for dynamic outdoor workouts full of energy. Discover the power of group motivation while benefiting from quality instruction in a personal setting. Train together, grow together! Duration: 60 minutes of group power! 🔥

outdoorBenefits.title: Why Train Outdoors? 🌳
outdoorBenefits.subtitle: Training outside offers unique benefits you won't find in a gym. Discover why fresh air and nature make your workout even more effective!

nature.title: Connect with Nature
nature.description: Training in the fresh air improves your mood and reduces stress. Nature provides a calming environment that helps you focus better on your workout.

vitamin.title: Natural Vitamin D
vitamin.description: Sunlight is your free source of vitamin D! Essential for strong bones, a healthy immune system, and better energy levels throughout the day.

mental.title: Mental Clarity
mental.description: Outdoor exercise boosts your mental health, improves concentration, and gives you more energy. The perfect combination of physical and mental training!

variety.title: Endless Variety
variety.description: Every outdoor session is unique! Use natural elements like benches, stairs, and uneven terrain for functional training that challenges your whole body.

schedule.title: The Schedule
schedule.subtitle: Small Group Training Schedule
schedule.onDemandDesc: Available on demand - Contact us to schedule your personalized sessions
schedule.locationNote: Fixed schedule for Small Group Training only

strip10.title: 10-Session Pass
strip10.desc: Flexible and affordable! Buy a pass for 10 sessions and train whenever it suits you. Perfect for those who want to exercise regularly without fixed commitments. Price: €135 - that's only €13.50 per session! 🎯

single.title: Single Session
single.desc: Want to try us out first? Join a single session for only €15 and discover if Desi4Fit is right for you! 🌟

signup.title: Ready to Start? 🚀
signup.nice: Great that you're interested! Fill in the form and we'll get back to you soon. No commitments, just getting to know each other! 😊
